document_data.name: Lastbowl
document_data.mainbody:
'''Lastbowl''' was a fruity dessert dish from the city of [[Velen]] in the nation of [[Tethyr]].

{{quote|''It clears the throat and tingles, a sheer kiss of the gods on hot nights!''|[[Volothamp Geddarm]]}}
document_data.Description: This dessert was a fruit salad served to finish a meal. It was a mixture of sliced [[lime]], [[mango]], and [[peach]] smothered in syrup.
document_data.History: As of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], Lastbowl could be found on [[Blackthorn's Brew]]'s menu, a [[festhall]] on the [[Captain's Cliff]] in Velen. The dish was mentioned among other notable foods included in [[Volothamp Geddarm]]'s published guide to [[Amn]] and Tethyr.
